title: [Test Epic] Agentic Kanban Bootstrap Validation
description:
## Summary
This is a test epic to validate the Agentic Kanban PM sync functionality.

## Atomic Tasks
- [ ] Test task can be parsed from epic body
- [ ] Test task appears in kanban/unassigned/
- [ ] Test task can be claimed by a Ralph dev

This epic will be closed after validation is complete.

tasks.description: Test task can be parsed from epic body
Test task can be claimed by a Ralph dev
